text: Taylor Swift has surpassed Rihanna on YouTube. The “ Look What You Made Me Do ” singer has more than 25, 892, 700 YouTube subscribers as of Friday afternoon, surpassing Rihanna ’ s 25, 884, 300 subscribers. Swift ’ s rival, Katy Perry sits just behind Rihanna with 25, 372, 600 subscribers. RELATED : Taylor Swift Drops New Track, ‘ Call It What You Want ’ Following a three - year break from new music, Swift has released four new singles in rapid succession, all ahead of her upcoming album, “ Reputation ” out Nov. 10. This week, Swift released her fourth single “ Call It What You Want ”. Rihanna has not released a new solo single in over a year. The talented ladies still have some catching up
